title: [Yegharren Valley, Wooded Slope]
description: Patches of green ferns and a profusion of wildflowers cover the gentle, rocky slope, thriving in the scattered moonlight that glistens through the branches of the surrounding oak trees.  Thick moss covers the numerous roots and rocks that encroach on the trail, ready to trip the unwary traveller.

Bright green ferns and a profusion of wildflowers cover the gentle, rocky slope, thriving in the scattered sunlight that glistens through the branches of the surrounding oak trees.  Thick moss covers the numerous roots and rocks that encroach on the trail, ready to trip the unwary traveller.
